languages.text:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.
languages.original_text:
Наносит <u>(от 25 до 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20% и накладывает 3 уровня {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
Цели, уклонившиеся от этой гранаты, получают только 1 уровень плавления.

traits.locale_text: Deals 8-15 Toxic damage with 15 armour penetration within the area and inflicts melting on targets for 2 rounds.
Deals 8-15 toxic damage within the area and inflicts melting on targets for 2 rounds. This attack has 15 armour penetration.
Deals 8-15 toxic damage within the area and inflicts melting on targets for 2 rounds. This attack has 15 armour penetration.

languages.text:
Наносит <u>(от 25 до 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20% и накладывает 3 уровня {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
Цели, уклонившиеся от этой гранаты, получают только 1 уровень плавления.
languages.original_text: Deals 8-15 toxic damage within the area and inflicts melting on targets for 2 rounds. This attack has 15 armour penetration.

traits.locale_text: Наносит 8–15 токсичного урона по области и накладывает на цели эффект плавления на 2 раунда. Пробитие брони составляет 15%.
Наносит 8–15 токсичного урона по области и накладывает на цели эффект плавления на 2 раунда. Пробитие брони составляет 15%.

languages.text:
对目标区域造成<u>25-50</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有20%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，并对目标施加3层{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了手雷的攻击，则只会受到1层熔化效果影响。
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: 对目标区域造成8-15点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，并对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此次攻击获得15点{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。

languages.text:
Inflige <u>(de 25 a 50)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} con 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} e inflige 3 acumulaciones del efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
Si el objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} la granada, solo sufre 1 acumulación de derretimiento.
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 8–15 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} en el área e inflige {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g} a los objetivos durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Este ataque tiene 15 de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.

languages.text:
20%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ<u>25～50</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を与え、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、蓄積数3の{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}効果を付与する。
ターゲットがこのグレネードを{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}した場合、蓄積数1の溶解効果のみ付与する。
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: 範囲内に8-15の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g}を与え、ターゲットに2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}を付与する。この攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は15。

languages.text:
Fügt <u>(von 25 bis 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} mit 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu und erteilt für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} 3 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g}-Effektes.
Wenn das Ziel dieser Granate {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} konnte, wird nur 1 Stapel Schmelzen erteilt.
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Fügt im Bereich 8–15 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} zu sowie {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g} bei Zielen für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}. Dieser Angriff hat eine {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} von 15.

languages.text:
Inflige <u>(entre 25 et 50)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} avec 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, et inflige 3 cumuls de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Si la cible {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} cette grenade, 1 seul cumul de Fusion est infligé.
languages.original_text:
Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts 3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
If the target has {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} this grenade, only 1 stack of melting is inflicted.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 8 à 15 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} dans la zone et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g} aux cibles pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Cette attaque s'accompagne de 15 de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
